name: Superlative Superstrength
description:
When the character to which this is attached uses a Charged Attack: Deal +1 DMG. If the Usage(s) are no less than 2, expend 1 less Unaligned Element.
Usage(s): 1 (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)
